name: Rare Fish
tagline: The first game designed and published by Little Dragon Inc. The theme was the OST song "Legendary Fish" from Touhou Project.
body: ###Rare Fish The first game designed and published by Little Dragon Inc. First usage of JavaScript alongside the Phaser engine. There is nothing notable about this project or its code. This was mainly just to test our various GitHub features. You can play the game here. ###Usage ``` python -m SimpleHTTPServer 9999 ``` then browse to localhost ###Attribution This game originally was based on the OST song "Legendary Fish" from Touhou which has since been removed from the commits.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
